returns.title: Returns Policy
returns.subtitle: We value your trust and strive to make the purchasing process as transparent and convenient as possible.
returns.returnPeriodText: You can return items within 7 days of purchase.
returns.itemConditionText: Items must be returned in perfect, new condition.
returns.packagingText: Original, undamaged box and complete packaging must be included.
returns.importantNoteText: Please carefully inspect items for mechanical damage or incomplete items (defects) immediately upon receiving your order.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to BAZARI ARA! We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our website.
privacy.section1Text: We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account, place an order, or contact customer service. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and delivery address.
privacy.section2Text: We use the collected information to:
privacy.section2Item3: Send you updates, promotional materials, and other information related to our services.
privacy.section2Item4: Respond to your inquiries and provide support.
privacy.section3Text: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Your data is stored on secure servers, and we use encryption to protect sensitive information.
privacy.section4Text: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to fulfill our obligations to you (for example, sharing data with delivery services).
privacy.section5Text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of receiving our marketing messages at any time.
privacy.section6Text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page. We recommend reviewing this page periodically for the latest information.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
